name: Controlled useState
description: Feedback form with character counter using controlled components with useState hook
approach: Uses React's useState hook to manage form inputs (name, email, comment) and validation states. Implements real-time character counting, email validation with regex, and console logging of form data.
features: Text input for name with validation
Real-time character counter with color coding
Console logging of feedback data in JSON format
Bootstrap card layout with success/error states
